author: Andrew Naughtie, Andrew Naughtie
title: Georgia senator who contracted coronavirus leaves Florida beach house after local outcry
description: Bruce Thompson headed to vacation home to recuperate after intensive care treatment
content:
A state senator from Georgia who travelled to his Florida beach house to recuperate from a case of Covid-19 has headed home after the local sheriff called him irresponsible and assigned a police detail to enforce a two-week quarantine.
Bruce Thompson, who re… [+3152 chars]
